title: Looking for a 5th for ranked
body: Looking for a fifth person to round out our ranked 5's team. Very casual team of 4 guys that are real life friends looking for a 5th person because we always have 4 and cant play flexed with 4 people. Add Creep Villain as a friend on LoL client for inv.

replies.body: might want to go ask on the NA boards my friend :)
i think its cause these players have a (NA) next to their name so they arent on our server even.
